column4: I've given a file read and write permission and I just gave the backup file for it the same, but when editing the file it still says "Could not create a backup file"
free space perhaps? is it somewhere in ~/ or elsewhere?
I got it already, just going to have the app ran in a bash script, write new config a temp loaction, have bash ask for the password and do its thing, and then delete the temp file. That'll work
